LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowAnimals: Allows mute pawns to tame and train animals, including keeping them tame.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_AllowRomance: Allow Romance (Enables Romance Attempt, Marriage Proposal, Break Up)
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowRomance: Allows mute pawns to initiate romance and propose to their lovers, rather than always having to wait for the other pawn to initiate.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_AllowCasual: Allow Casual (Enables Chit-Chat, Deep Talk, Slight, Insult)
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowCasual: Allows mute pawns to engage in standard socialisation like any other pawn, with new non-verbal log entries.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowComms: Allows mute pawns to use the comms console.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowRecruit: Allows mute pawns to recruit prisoners, with new non-verbal log entries.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_AllowSlavery: Allow Slavery (Enables Reduce Will, Enslave, Suppress)
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowSlavery: Allows mute pawns to take and keep slaves, with new non-verbal log entries.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingLabel_AllowConvert: Allow Conversion (Enables Conversion Ritual, Convert ability, and prisoner conversion)
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowConvert: Allows mute pawns to convert others to their ideoligion, with new non-verbal log entries.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowTrial: Allows mute pawns to use the leader ability Trial, with new non-verbal log entries.
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowSpeech: Allows mute pawns to use the Leader Speech and Throne Speech abilities (with Ideology and Royalty respectively).
LanguageData.CYB_SettingDesc_AllowTeach: Allows mute pawns to teach children at the school desk, with new non-verbal log entries.
